text: This is a list of Romanian writers. ==Literature== ===Old literature=== * Neagoe Basarab * Dosoftei * Miron Costin (1633-1691) * Grigore Ureche (1590-1647) * Ion Neculce (1672-1744) * Nicolae Milescu (1636-1708) * Antim Ivireanul (1650-1617) * Dimitrie Cantemir (1673-1723) * Gheorghe Asachi (1788-1869) ===19th century=== ====Romantic writers==== * Ion Budai-Deleanu * Dinicu Golescu * Anton Pann * Ion Heliade-Rădulescu * Grigore Alexandrescu * Constantin Negruzzi (1808-1868) * Ion Ghica (1817-1897) * Nicolae Filimon (1891-1895) * Alexandru Odobescu (1834-1895) * Bogdan Petriceicu-Hasdeu (1838-1907) * Iosif Vulcan (1841-1907) * Petre Ispirescu * Alexandru Odobescu * Alecu Russo * Alexandru Macedonski * Barbu Delavrancea ====The classics==== * Vasile Alecsandri (1821-1890) * Ion Creangă (1839-1889) * Ioan Slavici (1848-1925) * Mihai Eminescu (1850-1889) * Ion Luca Caragiale (1852-1912) ===Inter-war literature=== ====Transition literature==== * Duiliu Zamfirescu * Alexandru Davila * George Coşbuc * Ion Agârbiceanu (1882-1963) * Gala Galaction (1879-1961) * Constantin Stere (1865-1936) * Nicolae Iorga * Emil Gârleanu ====Female authors==== * Hortensia Papadat-Bengescu (1876-1955) * Martha Bibescu (1886-1973) * Elena Farago (1878-1954) * Ioana Postelnicu (b. 1910) * Elena Văcărescu (1864-1947) ====Analytical prose ==== * Anton Holban (1902-1937) * Gib Mihăescu (1894-1935) * Camil Petrescu (1894-1957) * Mihail Sebastian (1907-1945) * Ion Vinea ====Realist prose==== * Ion Agârbiceanu * Adrian Maniu * Ion Marin Sadoveanu * Eugeniu Botez (1877-1933) * George Călinescu (1899-1965) * Eugen Lovinescu (1881-1943) * Cezar Petrescu (1892-1961) * Liviu Rebreanu (1885-1944) * Mihail Sadoveanu (1889-1961) * Vasile Voiculescu * Mihail Sorbul * Ion Al. Brătescu-Voineşti * Alexandru Kiriţescu * George Călinescu * Alexandru Philippide * Zaharia Stancu * George Mihail Zamfirescu ====Poetic novels==== * Tudor Arghezi (1880-1967) * Mateiu Caragiale (1885-1936) ====Fantastic prose==== * Mircea Eliade (1907-1986) * Vasile Voiculescu (1884-1963) * Gellu Naum (1915-2001) * Vladimir Colin (1921-1991) ====Others==== * Tristan Tzara * Urmuz (1883-1923) - experimental novels * Benjamin Fundoianu * Panait Istrati (1884-1935) - exotic prose * Ionel Teodoreanu (1897-1954) - youth novels * Victor Eftimiu * Tudor Muşatescu * George Ciprian * Pavel Dan * Geo Bogza * Eugène Ionesco * Emil Cioran ===Post-war period=== ====Mainstream prose==== * Radu Tudoran * Eugen Jebeleanu * Emil Botta * Aurel Baranga * Horia Vintilă * Constantin Virgil Gheorghiu * Gellu Naum * Horia Lovinescu * Ion D. Sârbu * Marin Preda * Ştefan Augustin Doinaş * Petru Dumitriu * Constantin Chiriţǎ * A. E. Baconsky (1925-1977) * Eugen Barbu (1924-1993) * Nicolae Breban (b. 1934) * Alexandru Ivasiuc (1933-1977) * Fănuş Neagu (b. 1932) * Dumitru Radu Popescu (b. 1935) * Marin Preda (1922-1980) * Dinu Săraru (b. 1932) * Zaharia Stancu (1902-1974) * Constantin Ţoiu (b. 1923) * Ioan Alexandru * Ştefan Bǎnulescu * Teodor Mazilu * Titus Popovici * Dumitru Solomon * Dumitru Ţepeneag (b. 1937) ====Prose==== * Geo Bogza (1908-1993) * Rodica Ojog-Braşoveanu (1939-2002) * Constantin Chiriţă (1925-1991) * Brenda Stress (b. 1983) * Radu Tudoran (1917-1992) * Haralamb Zincă (b. 1923) * Doru Davidovici (1945-1989) ====Poetry==== * George Bacovia * Gheorghe Bajenaru * Ion Barbu * Mihai Beniuc * Lucian Blaga * Dan Botta * Leonid Dimov * Carmen Firan * Dumitru Găleșanu (b. 1955) * Octavian Goga * Nicolae Labiş * Ion Minulescu * Ion Pillat * Marin Sorescu * Nichita Stanescu * George Topîrceanu * Dorin Tudoran * Elena Liliana Popescu * Ilarie Voronca ====Romanian diaspora==== * Cristian Petru Bălan (b. 1936) * Matei Călinescu (b. 1934) * Andrei Codrescu (b. 1946) * Dan Dănilă (b. 1954) * Virgil Gheorghiu (1916-1992) * Paul Goma (b. 1935) * Leonard Oprea (b. 1953) * Dumitru Ţepeneag (b. 1937) ===Contemporary writers=== * Gabriela Adameşteanu (b. 1942) * Duşan Baiski (b. 1955) * Carmen-Francesca Banciu (b. 1955) * T. O. Bobe (b. 1969) * Rodica Bretin (b.1958) * Augustin Buzura (b. 1938) * Mircea Cărtărescu (b. 1956) * Mircea Ciobanu (1940-1997) * Ioan Mihai Cochinescu (b. 1951) * Virgil Duda (b. 1939) * Dumitru Găleșanu (b. 1955) * Ion Hobana (b.1931) * Mircea Nedelciu (1950-1999) * Alexandru Paleologu (1919-2005) * Octavian Paler (1927-2007) * Dora Pavel (b. 1946) * Elena Liliana Popescu (b. 1948) * Camelian Propinatiu (b. 1951) * Răzvan Rădulescu (b. 1967) * Leonard Oprea (b. 1953) * Ion Vianu (b. 1934) ==Essays and philosophy== ===20th century=== * Lucian Blaga (1895-1961) * Emil Cioran (1911-1995) * Ioan Petru Culianu (1950-1991) * Mircea Eliade (1907-1986) * Nae Ionescu (1890-1940) * Adrian Marino (1921-2005) * Constantin Noica (1909-1987) * Nicolae Steinhardt (1912-1989) * Petre Ţuţea (1902-1991) * Mircea Vulcănescu (1904-1952) ===Contemporary=== * Sorin Antohi (b. 1957) * Gabriel Liiceanu (b. 1942) * Horia-Roman Patapievici (b. 1957) * Andrei Pleşu (b. 1948) * Mihai Şora (b. 1916) ==Literary criticism== * Titu Maiorescu (1840-1917) * Eugen Lovinescu (1881-1946) * George Călinescu (1889-1965) * Tudor Vianu (1897-1964) * Şerban Cioculescu (1902-1988) * Eugen Simion (b. 1933) * Nicolae Manolescu (b. 1939) * Virgil Nemoianu (b. 1940) == Drama == * Ion Luca Caragiale (1852-1912) * Constantin Rădulescu-Motru (1868-1957) * Eugen Ionescu (1909-1994) * Mihail Sebastian (1907-1945) * Tudor Muşatescu (1930-1980) * Marin Sorescu (1936-1997) * writers Category:Lists of writers by nationality
title: List of Romanian writers
